title: What did Winston Churchill do? - Quora
tags: Politicians and Government Leaders of the United Kingdom

response.answer_text: My answer will not consist in his crucial role, in WWI or WW2. I will love to answer on his “less known”, legacy to the World, which to my humble opinion is equally important and genial. I will not try to see him on my answer as the “Great Leader leading Great Britain to Victory”, but to Sir Winston as a writer, philosopher and a man ahead of his time, connecting him with simple quotes, to what the World is experiencing today: • His concept on democracy. What you think about this ?  • Was he a “time resistant” pragmatist? Well you can judge:  • He knew a lot about war, and we all know it, but what was his thought on politics? Was he right?  • He failed and succeeded so many times in his public and personal life. I just want your opinion on his opinion about “failure and success:  • If you are feeling pessimistic about this answer and what could Churchill say about that, well he had the perfect answer:  • His conception of the spoken and unspoken words a lifetime ago. To me they are great, I don’t know what you think :  • Here is what he thought about courage in human morality and… courage of course:  • What he thought of America and Americans ? Well, he saw WWI and WW2 and what he had to say about that, after being “half American” himself:  • If you disliked and didn’t approve Sir Winston’s quotes, added here after a long selection ( did I mention his Nobel price on Literature on 1953? ), and all this quotes are not relevant and contemporary, well he has a Quote for that occasion, when you can add your comments or dislikes, based on this:  I hope you enjoyed folks, the “Philosopher inside a Warrior”!

He was the British Prime minister who was one of the great three leader of the Alliance. He stopped German blitzkrieg and joined forces with unoccupied countries and started fighting back against the Third Reich. There were too many things he left to the world, but the most important is freedom he left us as the Alliance whose one of the main protagonists was Churchill win the war.
